title: Industrial production, data on migration to cities

content.prompt: A historian researching factors that contributed to the rise of industrial production in the eighteenth and nineteenth centuries would find which of the following types of sources most helpful?

choices.label: Records of labor and trade union meetings
A tally of political speeches in favor of versus those opposed to colonial expansion
Data on migration of rural populations to urban areas

topic.text: 6.6: Causes of Migration in an Interconnected World

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
